markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 5" pfs="Standard">
[Fey Glamour](/Spells.aspx?ID=2110)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=629" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 264 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Bloodline**
[Fey](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=25)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Area** 30-foot burst or

**Target** up to 10 willing creatures
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

You call upon fey glamours to cloak an area or the targets in illusion. This has the effect of either [_illusory scene_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1570) on the area or [_illusory disguise_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1568) on the creatures, as if heightened to a rank 1 rank lower than _fey glamour_, and using _fey glamour's_ range and duration.
name: Fey Glamour

summary_markdown: You call upon fey glamours to cloak an area or the targets in illusion.
text: Fey Glamour Two Actions Source Player Core 2 pg. 264 1.1 Bloodline Fey Range 30 feet Area 30-foot burst or Target up to 10 willing creatures Duration 10 minutes --- You call upon fey glamours to cloak an area or the targets in illusion. This has the effect of either illusory scene on the area or illusory disguise on the creatures, as if heightened to a rank 1 rank lower than fey glamour , and using fey glamour's range and duration.
